question: Which of the following set of polymers are used as fibre?
(i) Teflon (ii) Starch (iii) Terylene (iv) Orlon
explanation: Terylene (Dacron) is a polyester used as a fibre. Orlon (Polyacrylonitrile) is used as a substitute for wool fibres. Teflon is used for non-stick coatings, and Starch is a carbohydrate.
